verses.roman:
nibhṛta-nikuñje vasi' dekhe rādhāra bāṭa
anveṣite āilā tāhāṅ gopikāra ṭhāṭa

synonyms: nibhṛta—solitary; nikuñje—in a bush; vasi'-sitting; dekhe—waiting to see; rādhāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; bāṭa—the passing; anveṣite—while searching; āilā—came; tāhāṅ—there; gopikāra—of the gopīs; ṭhāṭa—the phalanx.
translation: Kṛṣṇa was sitting in a solitary bush, waiting for Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī to pass by. But while He was searching, the gopīs arrived there, like a phalanx of soldiers.
